bridge-type.label: BSB-LAN Bridge
bridge-type.description: A bridge to connect a BSB-LAN device

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: The hostname or IP address of the BSB-LAN device.

parameter.name: passkey
parameter.label: Passkey
parameter.description: The passkey required to access the BSB-LAN device.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: The username required to access the BSB-LAN device (when using HTTP Basic Authentication).

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password required to access the BSB-LAN device (when using HTTP Basic Authentication).

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.
